name: CUSTOM Collection tabs #3
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign content_max_width = section.settings.content_max_width
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  
  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign active_tabs = section.settings.active_tabs
  assign tabs_gap = section.settings.tabs_gap
  assign tabs_gap_mobile = section.settings.tabs_gap_mobile
  assign tabs_bg_color = section.settings.tabs_bg_color
  assign tabs_border_thickness = section.settings.tabs_border_thickness
  assign tabs_border_color = section.settings.tabs_border_color
  assign tabs_radius = section.settings.tabs_radius

  assign first_tab = section.settings.first_tab
  assign second_tab = section.settings.second_tab
  assign tab_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal
  assign tab_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tab_padding_vertical = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical
  assign tab_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tab_bg_color = section.settings.tab_bg_color
  assign tab_bg_hover_color = section.settings.tab_bg_hover_color
  assign tab_bg_active_color = section.settings.tab_bg_active_color
  assign tab_border_thickness = section.settings.tab_border_thickness
  assign tab_border_color = section.settings.tab_border_color
  assign tab_border_hover_color = section.settings.tab_border_hover_color
  assign tab_border_active_color = section.settings.tab_border_active_color
  assign tab_radius = section.settings.tab_radius
  assign tab_custom = section.settings.tab_custom
  assign tab_font = section.settings.tab_font
  assign tab_size = section.settings.tab_size
  assign tab_size_mobile = section.settings.tab_size_mobile
  assign tab_height = section.settings.tab_height
  assign tab_color = section.settings.tab_color
  assign tab_hover_color = section.settings.tab_hover_color
  assign tab_active_color = section.settings.tab_active_color

  assign cards_layout = section.settings.cards_layout
  assign cards_layout_mobile = section.settings.cards_layout_mobile
  assign cards_per_row = section.settings.cards_per_row  
  assign cards_per_row_mobile = section.settings.cards_per_row_mobile  
  assign cards_slider_per_row = section.settings.cards_slider_per_row  
  assign cards_slider_per_row_mobile = section.settings.cards_slider_per_row_mobile  
  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile    
  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile

  assign use_arrow = section.settings.use_arrow
  assign collection_arrow_size = section.settings.collection_arrow_size
  assign collection_arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.collection_arrow_size_mobile
  assign collection_arrow_color = section.settings.collection_arrow_color
  assign collection_arrow_hover_color = section.settings.collection_arrow_hover_color
  assign collection_arrow_bg_color = section.settings.collection_arrow_bg_color
  assign collection_arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.collection_arrow_bg_hover_color

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign open_new_tab = section.settings.open_new_tab
  assign image_zoom = section.settings.image_zoom
  assign image_gradient = section.settings.image_gradient

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_align = section.settings.title_align
  assign title_align_mobile = section.settings.title_align_mobile
  assign title_vertical_align = section.settings.title_vertical_align
  assign title_vertical_align_mobile = section.settings.title_vertical_align_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign first_tab_count = 0
  assign second_tab_count = 0

  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'collection'
      if block.settings.tab == 'first'
        assign first_tab_count = first_tab_count | plus: 1
      endif
    endif
  endfor

  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'collection'
      if block.settings.tab == 'second'
        assign second_tab_count = second_tab_count | plus: 1
      endif
    endif
  endfor   

  assign lazy_load_setting = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign lazy_load_setting = 'eager'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ tab_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .collection-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 30px;
  }
 
  .collection-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ tabs_gap_mobile }}px;
    padding: 5px;
    border: {{ tabs_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tabs_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tabs_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tabs_bg_color }};
  }

  .collection-tab-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tab_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_color }};
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 400;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-tab-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_hover_color }};
    color: {{ tab_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-tab-{{ section.id }}.active {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_active_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_active_color }};
    color: {{ tab_active_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-left-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .collection-right-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 15px;
  }

  .collection-card-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: end;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    padding: 30px;
    z-index: 2;
    display: flex;
    align-items: {{ title_vertical_align_mobile }};
    justify-content: space-between;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
   
  .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    text-align: {{ title_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ collection_arrow_size_mobile | times: 0.6 }}px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: {{ collection_arrow_bg_color }}26;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
    background-color: {{ collection_arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ collection_arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ collection_arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ collection_arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ collection_arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }
  .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .collection-grid-{{ section.id }},
  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;   
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 5%;
  }

  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 5%;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
    .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .collection-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-desktop {
      display: grid !important;
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row }}, 1fr);
      gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
    }
    .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-desktop {
      display: block !important;
    }
  }

  @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {
    .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .collection-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-mobile {
      display: grid !important;
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row_mobile }}, 1fr);
      gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
    }
    .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-mobile {
      display: block !important;
    }
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .collection-top-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row;
    }

    .collection-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ tabs_gap }}px;    
    }

    .collection-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal }}px;    
      font-size: {{ tab_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {    
      text-align: {{ title_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt}}px;
    }

    .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ title_vertical_align }};
    }

    .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{  collection_arrow_size | times: 0.6 }}px;
    }

    .collection-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ collection_arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ collection_arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    } 
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif width == 'page' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: var(--page-width);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tab_custom %}
  <style>
    .collection-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tab_font.family }}, {{ tab_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tab_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tab_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_align_mobile == 'center' %}
  {% if title_vertical_align_mobile == 'center' %}
    <style>
      @media(max-width: 1024px) {
        .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 10px;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
        }
      }     
    </style>
  {% elsif title_vertical_align_mobile == 'end' %}
    <style>
      @media(max-width: 1024px) {
        .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
          flex-direction: column-reverse;
          gap: 10px;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: end;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% else %}
    <style>
      @media(max-width: 1024px) {
        .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 10px;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: start;
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}
{% elsif title_align_mobile == 'right' %}
  <style>
    @media(max-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_align == 'center' %}
  {% if title_vertical_align == 'center' %}
    <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 10px;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
      }
    }  
  </style>
  {% elsif title_vertical_align == 'end' %}
    <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: column-reverse;
        gap: 10px;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: end;
      }
    }  
  </style>
  {% else %}
    <style>
      @media(min-width: 1024px) {
        .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 10px;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: start;
        }
      }  
    </style>
  {% endif %}
{% elsif title_align == 'right' %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
        flex-direction: row;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_zoom %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img,
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
      transform: translateZ(0);
      transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
    }

    .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img,
    .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
      transform: scale(1.1) translateZ(0);
      transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}  {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_gradient %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }}:after {
      background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent, rgba(0, 0, 0, .4));
      content: "";
      height: 100%;
      left: 0;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      width: 100%;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{ block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
 
        .collection-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          width: 100%;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
        }

        .collection-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .collection-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
            max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
          }
        
          .collection-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .collection-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'sub_heading' %}
      <style>
        {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
 
        .collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          width: 100%;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt_mobile }}px;
        }

        .collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
            max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_mt }}px;
          }
        
          .collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>
      {% if block.settings.sub_heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.sub_heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}


    {% when 'text' %}
      <style>
        {{ block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
 
        .collection-text-{{ block.id }} {
          width: 100%;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
        }

        .collection-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .collection-text-{{ block.id }} {
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
            max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
          }
        
          .collection-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>
      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .collection-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} collection-{{ section.id }}" {% if background_style == 'solid' %}style="background-color:{{ background_color }};"{% else %} style="background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"{% endif %}>
  <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
    <div class="collection-top-{{ section.id }}">
      <div class="collection-left-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% case block.type %}
            {% when 'heading' %}
              {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                <div class="collection-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div> 
              {% endif %} 
            {% when 'sub_heading' %}
              {% if block.settings.sub_heading != blank %}
                <div class="collection-sub-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.sub_heading }}</div> 
              {% endif %} 
            {% when 'text' %}
              {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                <div class="collection-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div> 
              {% endif %} 
          {% endcase %}
        {% endfor %} 
      </div>
      <div class="collection-tabs-{{ section.id }}">
        {% if first_tab_count != 0 %}
          <p class="collection-tab-{{ section.id }} collection-first-tab-{{ section.id }} {% if active_tabs == 'first' %}active{% endif %}"> {{ first_tab }}</p>
        {% endif %}

        {% if second_tab_count != 0 %}
          <p class="collection-tab-{{ section.id }} collection-second-tab-{{ section.id }} {% if active_tabs == 'second' %}active{% endif %}"> {{ second_tab }}</p>
        {% endif %}
      </div>
    </div>

    {% liquid
      assign desktop_layout = section.settings.cards_layout
      assign mobile_layout = section.settings.cards_layout_mobile
    %}

    <div class="collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }} collection-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {% if active_tabs == 'first' %}active-content-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
      <div class="collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {% if desktop_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-mobile{% endif %}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.settings.tab == 'first' %}
            <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% elsif block.settings.collection != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="collection-card-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                  {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                    loading: lazy_load_setting,
                    width: block.settings.image.width,
                    height: block.settings.image.height,
                    sizes: sizes,
                    widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                  }}
                {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                  {{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                    loading: lazy_load_setting,
                    width: block.settings.collection.featured_image.width,
                    height: block.settings.collection.featured_image.height,
                    sizes: sizes,
                    widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                  }}
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              <div class="collection-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                  <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.collection.title }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                {% if use_arrow %}
                  <div class="collection-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg viewBox="0 0 12 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M6 0L4.942 1.058 9.127 5.25H0v1.5h9.127l-4.185 4.193L6 12l6-6-6-6z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.collection != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      <div class="collection-slider-first-{{ section.id }} collection-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper {% if desktop_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-mobile{% endif %}"
        data-gap="{{ cards_gap }}"
        data-gap-mobile="{{ cards_gap_mobile }}"
        data-view="{{ cards_slider_per_row }}"
        data-view-mobile="{{ cards_slider_per_row_mobile }}">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.settings.tab == 'first' %}
              <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% elsif block.settings.collection != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="collection-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                      loading: lazy_load_setting,
                      width: block.settings.image.width,
                      height: block.settings.image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                  {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                      loading: lazy_load_setting,
                      width: block.settings.collection.featured_image.width,
                      height: block.settings.collection.featured_image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                <div class="collection-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                    <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                  {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                    <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.collection.title }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if use_arrow %}
                    <div class="collection-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                      <svg viewBox="0 0 12 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <path d="M6 0L4.942 1.058 9.127 5.25H0v1.5h9.127l-4.185 4.193L6 12l6-6-6-6z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                      </svg>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.collection != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        <button class="collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <button class="collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>  
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="collection-tab-content-{{ section.id }} collection-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {% if active_tabs == 'second' %}active-content-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
      <div class="collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {% if desktop_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-mobile{% endif %}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.settings.tab == 'second' %}
            <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% elsif block.settings.collection != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="collection-card-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                  {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                    loading: lazy_load_setting,
                    width: block.settings.image.width,
                    height: block.settings.image.height,
                    sizes: sizes,
                    widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                  }}
                {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                  {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                  {{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                    loading: lazy_load_setting,
                    width: block.settings.collection.featured_image.width,
                    height: block.settings.collection.featured_image.height,
                    sizes: sizes,
                    widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                  }}
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              <div class="collection-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                  <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.collection.title }}</p>
                {% endif %}
                {% if use_arrow %}
                  <div class="collection-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg viewBox="0 0 12 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M6 0L4.942 1.058 9.127 5.25H0v1.5h9.127l-4.185 4.193L6 12l6-6-6-6z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.collection != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      <div class="collection-slider-second-{{ section.id }} collection-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper {% if desktop_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-mobile{% endif %}"
        data-gap="{{ cards_gap }}"
        data-gap-mobile="{{ cards_gap_mobile }}"
        data-view="{{ cards_slider_per_row }}"
        data-view-mobile="{{ cards_slider_per_row_mobile }}">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.settings.tab == 'second' %}
              <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% elsif block.settings.collection != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="collection-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                      loading: lazy_load_setting,
                      width: block.settings.image.width,
                      height: block.settings.image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                  {% elsif block.settings.collection != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                      loading: lazy_load_setting,
                      width: block.settings.collection.featured_image.width,
                      height: block.settings.collection.featured_image.height,
                      sizes: sizes,
                      widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                <div class="collection-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                    <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                  {% elsif block.settings.collection.title != blank %}
                    <p class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.collection.title }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if use_arrow %}
                    <div class="collection-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                      <svg viewBox="0 0 12 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <path d="M6 0L4.942 1.058 9.127 5.25H0v1.5h9.127l-4.185 4.193L6 12l6-6-6-6z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                      </svg>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.collection != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        <button class="collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <button class="collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>  
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>


<script>
  function initCollectionTab3() {
    const swiperSelectors = [
      `.collection-slider-first-{{ section.id }}`,
      `.collection-slider-second-{{ section.id }}`
    ];

    swiperSelectors.forEach(selector => {
      const element = document.querySelector(selector);
      if (element) {
        new Swiper(selector, {
          speed: 300,
          loop: true,
          navigation: {
            nextEl: `.collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}`,
            prevEl: `.collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}`,
          },
          breakpoints: {
            320: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gapMobile || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.viewMobile || 1),
            },
            768: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gap || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.view || 3),
            },
            1024: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gap || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.view || 3),
            }
          }
        });
      }
    });

    const firstTab = document.querySelector('.collection-first-tab-{{ section.id }}');
    const secondTab = document.querySelector('.collection-second-tab-{{ section.id }}');

    function switchTabToFirst() {
      secondTab.classList.remove('active');
      firstTab.classList.add('active');

      document.querySelector('.collection-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
      document.querySelector('.collection-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.add('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
    }

    function switchTabToSecond() {
      secondTab.classList.add('active');
      firstTab.classList.remove('active');

      document.querySelector('.collection-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.add('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
      document.querySelector('.collection-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
    }

    if (firstTab) {
      firstTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToFirst);
    }

    if (secondTab) {
      secondTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToSecond);
    }
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initCollectionTab3);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initCollectionTab3);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initCollectionTab3);
  }
</script>

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load media for speed optimisation
